snippet: Commodities smuggler Subhash Kapoor faces fresh charges for antiquities allegedly stolen from India temples.
abstract: Commodities smuggler Subhash Kapoor faces fresh charges for antiquities allegedly stolen from India temples.
lead_paragraph: Subhash Kapoor has “been called ‘one of the most prolific commodities smugglers in the world today’ — a longtime Manhattan antiquities dealer alleged to have trafficked more than $100 million worth of looted Indian cultural artifacts,” Ralph Blumenthal wrote in the Arts Beat Blog, and on Wednesday “federal authorities added to the litany of thefts” attributed to him.

headline.main: Authorities Seize Items Said To Have Been Looted from Indian Temples
